implementation.name: Classic Assembler
implementation.description:
The standard assembler supported by the OpenEJB team.
If feel you need your own Assembler implementation, please consult the OpenEJB team before preceeding, the control you need may be added to the Classic Assembler if we feel it also serves the community in general.
implementation.detail: Assembles all aspects of the container system based on the data in an object structure called the InfoObjects
